Amulet Of Thirst.description:
This simple amulet is made from a clear crystal wrapped in gold on a golden
 chain. The amulet has 1 charge and regains its charge at dawn each day. After
 spending 1 hour submerged in a potion, this amulet stores that potion's effect
 as the crystal takes on that potion's color. This expends the amulet's charge.
 The potion then becomes mundane liquid. You may activate the amulet for 1 AP
 and immediately gain the stored effect as if you had consumed the potion
 yourself. After using this feature, the amulet's crystal returns to its
 original clear state and no longer has any potion effects.
Amulet Of Thirst.content:
Necklace, Common, Essence 10



This simple amulet is made from a clear crystal wrapped in gold on a golden chain. The amulet has 1 charge and regains its charge at dawn each day. After spending 1 hour submerged in a potion, this amulet stores that potion's effect as the crystal takes on that potion's color. This expends the amulet's charge. The potion then becomes mundane liquid. You may activate the amulet for 1 AP and immediately gain the stored effect as if you had consumed the potion yourself. After using this feature, the amulet's crystal returns to its original clear state and no longer has any potion effects.

Book Of Secrets.description:
This book is bound in an unidentifiable leather dyed a dark blue and is edged
 in elegant gold leaf. The book has 6 charges, and regains 1d4 charges at dawn
 each day. If examined, the pages inside are blank, and if you write in the
 book, it disappears after 1 hour. By spending 1 charge, speaking a command
 word, and saying the name of one humanoid within 10 miles of you, the pages
 within the book begin to fill with information about that target humanoid as
 if written by a personal biographer. Anyone who spends 30 minutes reading this
 book gains a +8 to any INT/History check made to learn information about the
 target humanoid, and gains a +6 to AWR/Intuiting, CHA/Intimidating, and
 CHA/Persuading when interacting with the target humanoid for the next 24
 hours. This writing remains in the book for 1 hour, after which it fades and
 becomes blank once again.
Book Of Secrets.content:
Book, Rare, Essence 35



This book is bound in an unidentifiable leather dyed a dark blue and is edged in elegant gold leaf. The book has 6 charges, and regains 1d4 charges at dawn each day. If examined, the pages inside are blank, and if you write in the book, it disappears after 1 hour. By spending 1 charge, speaking a command word, and saying the name of one humanoid within 10 miles of you, the pages within the book begin to fill with information about that target humanoid as if written by a personal biographer. Anyone who spends 30 minutes reading this book gains a +8 to any INT/History check made to learn information about the target humanoid, and gains a +6 to AWR/Intuiting, CHA/Intimidating, and CHA/Persuading when interacting with the target humanoid for the next 24 hours. This writing remains in the book for 1 hour, after which it fades and becomes blank once again.

Boots Of The Swiftwind.description:
These sheepskin boots are dyed a light grey-blue and have silver capped heels.
 These boots grant you +10 ft walking speed and double your horizontal jump
 distance. Once per day, you can click the heels of these boots together and
 gain a vertical jump height of 20 ft until the end of their next turn.
Boots Of The Swiftwind.content:
Boots, Rare, Essence 20



These sheepskin boots are dyed a light grey-blue and have silver capped heels. These boots grant you +10 ft walking speed and double your horizontal jump distance. Once per day, you can click the heels of these boots together and gain a vertical jump height of 20 ft until the end of their next turn.

Bottomless Bag.description:
This green-velvet bag is tied with a golden string and can open to a diameter
 of 1 ft. The bag appears empty when examined or turned inside out but anything
 deposited into it disappears into a pocket dimension. By spending 2 AP, you
 can reach into the bag and retrieve something stored within this pocket
 dimension. It can be a random item (determined by the MC) or a specific one.
 The Bottomless Bag can hold up to 500 lbs of items but never weighs more than
 2 lbs when worn. The bottomless bag's pocket dimension contains no breathable
 air. The bag's environment is considered ambient room temperature, and organic
 matter will rot at its normal rate.
Bottomless Bag.content:
Container, Uncommon, Essence 15



This green-velvet bag is tied with a golden string and can open to a diameter of 1 ft. The bag appears empty when examined or turned inside out but anything deposited into it disappears into a pocket dimension. By spending 2 AP, you can reach into the bag and retrieve something stored within this pocket dimension. It can be a random item (determined by the MC) or a specific one. The Bottomless Bag can hold up to 500 lbs of items but never weighs more than 2 lbs when worn. The bottomless bag's pocket dimension contains no breathable air. The bag's environment is considered ambient room temperature, and organic matter will rot at its normal rate.

Beastheart Gauntlets.description:
These leather gauntlets are wrapped in thick brown fur. You gain +1 STR and
 you gain an additional damage die to all your unarmed attacks (e.g. 1d4
 becomes 2d4).
Beastheart Gauntlets.content:
Gloves, Rare, Essence 20



These leather gauntlets are wrapped in thick brown fur. You gain +1 STR and you gain an additional damage die to all your unarmed attacks (e.g. 1d4 becomes 2d4).

Bracers Of Conduction.description:
These silver gauntlets are decorated with lightning bolts of white crystal.
 You gain Resist Lightning 3. Additionally, when you take lightning damage, you
 gain 1 charge for every 3 damage taken, to a maximum of 4 charges. When you
 make a melee or ranged attack, you may spend +1 AP to consume any number of
 charges as part of the attack. If the attack hits, the target takes +1d10
 lightning damage for every charge consumed.
Bracers Of Conduction.content:
Gloves, Rare, Essence 20



These silver gauntlets are decorated with lightning bolts of white crystal. You gain Resist Lightning 3. Additionally, when you take lightning damage, you gain 1 charge for every 3 damage taken, to a maximum of 4 charges. When you make a melee or ranged attack, you may spend +1 AP to consume any number of charges as part of the attack. If the attack hits, the target takes +1d10 lightning damage for every charge consumed.

Brewer's Cask.description:
This small oaken cask has two silver bands carved with images of grape vines.
 Any mundane item or liquid sealed inside the Brewer's Cask ages 1 year for
 every hour.
Brewer's Cask.content:
Container, Common, Essence 10



This small oaken cask has two silver bands carved with images of grape vines. Any mundane item or liquid sealed inside the Brewer's Cask ages 1 year for every hour.

Carrion Cloak.description:
This cloak appears to be nothing more than tattered, foul-smelling rags
 infested with all manner of insects. The cloak has 1 charge, and regains its
 charge daily at dusk. You may spend 2 AP and 1 charge to summon 1d4
 Swarms of Insects. These swarms appear in unoccupied spaces within 5 ft
 of you and go immediately after you in Initiative. They follow your mental
 commands and last for 10 minutes or until reduced to 0 HP, whereupon they
 dissipate.
Carrion Cloak.content:
Cloak, Rare, Essence 30



This cloak appears to be nothing more than tattered, foul-smelling rags infested with all manner of insects. The cloak has 1 charge, and regains its charge daily at dusk. You may spend 2 AP and 1 charge to summon 1d4 Swarms of Insects. These swarms appear in unoccupied spaces within 5 ft of you and go immediately after you in Initiative. They follow your mental commands and last for 10 minutes or until reduced to 0 HP, whereupon they dissipate.

Circlet Of Mind Shielding.description:
This plain steel circlet has a single ruby set on the forehead. You gain
 Immune Psychic, Charmed, and Enthralled. You are also Immune to any magical
 ability that reads thoughts.
Circlet Of Mind Shielding.content:
Helmet, Rare, Essence 30



This plain steel circlet has a single ruby set on the forehead. You gain Immune Psychic, Charmed, and Enthralled. You are also Immune to any magical ability that reads thoughts.

Circlet Of Thought Detection.description:
This elegant silver circlet is affixed with three purple gems over the temples
 and forehead. This circlet has 3 charges and regains 1 charge at dusk each
 night. You may spend 1 charge and 2 AP to read the thoughts of one creature
 you can see within 200 ft of you for 1 minute. These thoughts are always
 surface level, and the target does not become aware their thoughts are being
 read.

 If you spend 1 minute concentrating on the circlet, taking 1d8 damage after
 this time, you may regain 1 charge. (1/Recoup)
Circlet Of Thought Detection.content:
Helmet, Rare, Essence 20



This elegant silver circlet is affixed with three purple gems over the temples and forehead. This circlet has 3 charges and regains 1 charge at dusk each night. You may spend 1 charge and 2 AP to read the thoughts of one creature you can see within 200 ft of you for 1 minute. These thoughts are always surface level, and the target does not become aware their thoughts are being read.


If you spend 1 minute concentrating on the circlet, taking 1d8 damage after this time, you may regain 1 charge. (1/Recoup)

Climber's Gloves.description:
These sheepskin gloves have small metal protrusions on the tips of each
 finger. Gain a climb speed equal to your walking speed.
Climber's Gloves.content:
Gloves, Uncommon, Essence 15



These sheepskin gloves have small metal protrusions on the tips of each finger. Gain a climb speed equal to your walking speed.

Cloak Of Shadows.description:
This ragged linen cloak is dyed the deepest, darkest black. You gain +6 to
 DEX/Sneaking checks to remain hidden while in darkness. This cloak has 3
 charges and regains all spent charges at dusk. When you spend AP to move, you
 can expend a charge to step through a shadow and reappear in an unoccupied
 space in another shadow you can see within 90 ft of you.
Cloak Of Shadows.content:
Cloak, Rare, Essence 20



This ragged linen cloak is dyed the deepest, darkest black. You gain +6 to DEX/Sneaking checks to remain hidden while in darkness. This cloak has 3 charges and regains all spent charges at dusk. When you spend AP to move, you can expend a charge to step through a shadow and reappear in an unoccupied space in another shadow you can see within 90 ft of you.

Crane Paper.description:
These pages of thin silver-edged paper are of an expert quality. After
 whispering a target's name, the paper immediately folds into the shape of a
 bird and attempts to fly straight to the target's location. If the target is
 not on the same plane of existence as the Crane Paper when activated, the
 paper immediately combusts.
Crane Paper.content:
Supernatural Item, Common, Essence 10



These pages of thin silver-edged paper are of an expert quality. After whispering a target's name, the paper immediately folds into the shape of a bird and attempts to fly straight to the target's location. If the target is not on the same plane of existence as the Crane Paper when activated, the paper immediately combusts.

Deployable Glider.description:
This leather pack is fixed over a metal harness that can be worn by a small or
 medium sized creature. While worn, it functions as a normal traveler's
 backpack or can be activated via a pull-string to deploy a pair of mechanical
 leather wings. For 10 minutes upon activation, you do not take falling damage,
 and for every 10 ft that you fall, you may move 10 ft horizontally. Once used,
 you must Take a Rest in order to reset this feature. (1/Rest)
Deployable Glider.content:
Container, Uncommon, Essence 15


This leather pack is fixed over a metal harness that can be worn by a small or medium sized creature. While worn, it functions as a normal traveler's backpack or can be activated via a pull-string to deploy a pair of mechanical leather wings. For 10 minutes upon activation, you do not take falling damage, and for every 10 ft that you fall, you may move 10 ft horizontally. Once used, you must Take a Rest in order to reset this feature. (1/Rest)

Die Of Beasts.description:
This single 6-sided die appears to be made of crudely carved bone. Each face
 has a different number of carved dots from 1 to 6. The die has 1 charge and
 regains 1 charge at dusk each night. By spending 2 AP and spending its charge,
 you can roll the Die of Beasts to summon a creature from the following table.
 This creature appears in an unoccupied space within 5 ft of you, is under your
 control, and takes its turn immediately after you. After one hour or once it
 is reduced to 0 HP, the creature disappears.

 d6
 | 
 Summoned Creature

 1
 | 
 Dire Rat

 2
 | 
 Wolf

 3
 | 
 Riding Horse

 4
 | 
 Grizzly Bear

 5
 | 
 Elephant

 6
 | 
 Stoneshark
Die Of Beasts.content:
Supernatural Item, Epic, Essence 45



This single 6-sided die appears to be made of crudely carved bone. Each face has a different number of carved dots from 1 to 6. The die has 1 charge and regains 1 charge at dusk each night. By spending 2 AP and spending its charge, you can roll the Die of Beasts to summon a creature from the following table. This creature appears in an unoccupied space within 5 ft of you, is under your control, and takes its turn immediately after you. After one hour or once it is reduced to 0 HP, the creature disappears.

d6

Summoned Creature

1

Dire Rat

2

Wolf

3

Riding Horse

4

Grizzly Bear

5

Elephant

6

Stoneshark

Die Of Self.description:
This single 6-sided die appears to be made of solid Essence from the Celestial
 Sea. Each face has a different number of pinpricks of starlight from 1 to 6.
 It has 1 charge, and regains its charge at midnight each night. By spending 2
 AP, you can roll the Die of Self to give yourself a feature from the following
 table. This feature lasts for one hour or until you are reduced to 0 HP.

 d6
 | 
 Effect

 1
 | 
 Eyes of the Veil: You gain Truesight 30 ft.

 2
 | 

 Arm of the Deep: One of your arms becomes a large tentacle. You
 gain +10 ft reach and +6 to Grappling checks.

 3
 | 

 Feet of the Wanderer: You cannot be Slowed or knocked Prone.
 You are unhindered by Difficult Terrain and can walk on walls and
 ceilings as though they were ground.

 4
 | 

 Heart of the Earth: You gain +4 to END checks and have Immune
 Toxic Immune Poisons.

 5
 | 

 Wings of the Celestial: You gain a fly speed equal to your
 walking speed.

 6
 | 

 Voice of the Gods: You gain a +4 to CHA/Persuading checks and
 can make a special attack one time during the duration by spending 4
 AP. Make a CHA+4 attack against the WILL of a creature within 60 ft of
 you. On a hit, the creature is Enthralled. Only one target can be
 Enthralled at a time by this feature.
Die Of Self.content:
Supernatural Item, Epic, Essence 60



This single 6-sided die appears to be made of solid Essence from the Celestial Sea. Each face has a different number of pinpricks of starlight from 1 to 6. It has 1 charge, and regains its charge at midnight each night. By spending 2 AP, you can roll the Die of Self to give yourself a feature from the following table. This feature lasts for one hour or until you are reduced to 0 HP.

d6

Effect

1

Eyes of the Veil: You gain Truesight 30 ft.

2

Arm of the Deep: One of your arms becomes a large tentacle. You gain +10 ft reach and +6 to Grappling checks.

3

Feet of the Wanderer: You cannot be Slowed or knocked Prone. You are unhindered by Difficult Terrain and can walk on walls and ceilings as though they were ground.

4

Heart of the Earth: You gain +4 to END checks and have Immune Toxic Immune Poisons.

5

Wings of the Celestial: You gain a fly speed equal to your walking speed.

6

Voice of the Gods: You gain a +4 to CHA/Persuading checks and can make a special attack one time during the duration by spending 4 AP. Make a CHA+4 attack against the WILL of a creature within 60 ft of you. On a hit, the creature is Enthralled. Only one target can be Enthralled at a time by this feature.

Die Of Time.description:
This single 6-sided die is carefully crafted of intricate copper and brass
 clockwork. Each face has a different number of copper nubs from 1 to 6. By
 spending 2 AP, you can roll the Die of Time to activate an effect from the
 following table. Once the effect activates, the die cannot be used again for
 2d12 hours.

 d6
 | 
 Effect

 1
 | 

 You are attacked by a hostile creature native to your current
 environment.

 2
 | 

 The weather of the region immediately changes as determined by the MC.

 3
 | 

 You may know the exact current location of one person or object you
 choose within 10 miles of you.

 4
 | 

 You gain double your standard AP on your next turn. If you are not in
 combat, you gain double your standard AP on the first turn you take in
 combat before Taking a Rest.

 5
 | 
 You gain the benefits of a Recoup.

 6
 | 
 You gain the benefits of Taking a Rest.
Die Of Time.content:
Supernatural Item, Legendary, Essence 65


This single 6-sided die is carefully crafted of intricate copper and brass clockwork. Each face has a different number of copper nubs from 1 to 6. By spending 2 AP, you can roll the Die of Time to activate an effect from the following table. Once the effect activates, the die cannot be used again for 2d12 hours.


d6

Effect

1

You are attacked by a hostile creature native to your current environment.

2

The weather of the region immediately changes as determined by the MC.

3

You may know the exact current location of one person or object you choose within 10 miles of you.

4

You gain double your standard AP on your next turn. If you are not in combat, you gain double your standard AP on the first turn you take in combat before Taking a Rest.

5

You gain the benefits of a Recoup.

6

You gain the benefits of Taking a Rest.

Endless Quiver.description:
This unassuming leather quiver is inlaid with bronze and appears empty. As
 part of a ranged attack, you can choose to magically produce and draw a bolt
 or arrow for use as ammunition. This bolt or arrow adds +1 to the attack and
 damage roll and disappears after striking a target. Only one bolt or arrow can
 be drawn from the Endless Quiver at any time.
Endless Quiver.content:
Supernatural Item, Rare, Essence 25



This unassuming leather quiver is inlaid with bronze and appears empty. As part of a ranged attack, you can choose to magically produce and draw a bolt or arrow for use as ammunition. This bolt or arrow adds +1 to the attack and damage roll and disappears after striking a target. Only one bolt or arrow can be drawn from the Endless Quiver at any time.

Flute Of The Gravecaller.description:
When played, this carved bone flute emits a haunting, discordant tone. You may
 spend 4 AP to play the flute and summon a Ghost to an unoccupied space within
 20 ft of you. This ghost has the same skills and memories it did in life and
 must obey your commands. It takes its Initiative immediately after you and
 lasts for 1 minute or until reduced to 0 HP. The Ghost must answer your
 questions but does not have to answer honestly. Once this feature is
 activated, it cannot be used again for 48 hours.
Flute Of The Gravecaller.content:
Instrument, Epic, Essence 35



When played, this carved bone flute emits a haunting, discordant tone. You may spend 4 AP to play the flute and summon a Ghost to an unoccupied space within 20 ft of you. This ghost has the same skills and memories it did in life and must obey your commands. It takes its Initiative immediately after you and lasts for 1 minute or until reduced to 0 HP. The Ghost must answer your questions but does not have to answer honestly. Once this feature is activated, it cannot be used again for 48 hours.

Frostwalker Boots.description:
These leather boots are lined in snow-white fur. The boots have 1 charge, and
 regain 1 charge at midnight. You gain +6 to checks made to resist the effects
 of cold weather. You may spend 1 charge to speak a command word and activate
 the boots to gain the ability to walk on water for 10 minutes, as the water
 freezes solid beneath each step. At the end of this 10 minutes, any water
 frozen by the Frostwalker Boots immediately returns to its previous state.
Frostwalker Boots.content:
Boots, Rare, Essence 20


These leather boots are lined in snow-white fur. The boots have 1 charge, and regain 1 charge at midnight. You gain +6 to checks made to resist the effects of cold weather. You may spend 1 charge to speak a command word and activate the boots to gain the ability to walk on water for 10 minutes, as the water freezes solid beneath each step. At the end of this 10 minutes, any water frozen by the Frostwalker Boots immediately returns to its previous state.

Girdle Of The Wolf.description:
This simple belt is made from gray wolf fur. You gain +2 to melee attack rolls
 if you have an ally within 5 ft of your target. Additionally, you may spend 4
 AP to transform into a Wolf. While transformed, you use your own HP,
 INT, and CHA, but otherwise use the stat block of a wolf with +2 to its DEX.
 As a wolf, you may spend your whole turn to transform back into your original
 form.
Girdle Of The Wolf.content:
Worn Item, Rare, Essence 20


This simple belt is made from gray wolf fur. You gain +2 to melee attack rolls if you have an ally within 5 ft of your target. Additionally, you may spend 4 AP to transform into a Wolf. While transformed, you use your own HP, INT, and CHA, but otherwise use the stat block of a wolf with +2 to its DEX. As a wolf, you may spend your whole turn to transform back into your original form.

Gloves Of The Thought Thief.description:
These fingerless leather gloves have small milky white gems set over the
 knuckles. You gain +4 to INT/Sleight of Hand checks. Additionally, you may
 spend 2 AP to target a creature within 5 ft of you and make a special attack.
 Make a CHA attack against their WILL. On a hit, the target is Dazed until the
 end of their next turn and loses the memory of everything that happened in the
 last minute.
Gloves Of The Thought Thief.content:
Gloves, Rare, Essence 30


These fingerless leather gloves have small milky white gems set over the knuckles. You gain +4 to INT/Sleight of Hand checks. Additionally, you may spend 2 AP to target a creature within 5 ft of you and make a special attack. Make a CHA attack against their WILL. On a hit, the target is Dazed until the end of their next turn and loses the memory of everything that happened in the last minute.

Ivory Whistle.description:
This small, hand-carved whistle appears to be made of ivory. When blown, a
 trail of smoke exits the whistle and takes the form of a black horse. This
 horse has the Draft Horse stat block. It appears in an unoccupied space
 within 20 ft of you, obeys your mental commands, and lasts for up to 24 hours,
 until dismissed for 1 AP, or until reaching 0 HP. Once this whistle has been
 activated, it cannot be activated again for three days.
Ivory Whistle.content:
Instrument, Rare, Essence 20


This small, hand-carved whistle appears to be made of ivory. When blown, a trail of smoke exits the whistle and takes the form of a black horse. This horse has the Draft Horse stat block. It appears in an unoccupied space within 20 ft of you, obeys your mental commands, and lasts for up to 24 hours, until dismissed for 1 AP, or until reaching 0 HP. Once this whistle has been activated, it cannot be activated again for three days.

Mad Tinkerer's Toolbox.description:
This plain-looking metal latched box has chipped red paint and plenty of dings
 and dents. It offers a +2 bonus to all Crafting checks made when you use this
 item. Once every 24 hours, when you would take damage from failing a survival
 or crafting check, you can choose to transfer any amount of that damage to the
 toolbox. This cannot reduce damage taken from creatures (such as bites, kicks,
 scratches, and the like). The toolbox is found with 10d8 (45) HP left. When
 the toolbox runs out of HP, any leftover damage from the transfer that caused
 it to break is directed back to you.
Mad Tinkerer's Toolbox.content:
Container, Rare, Essence 20


This plain-looking metal latched box has chipped red paint and plenty of dings and dents. It offers a +2 bonus to all Crafting checks made when you use this item. Once every 24 hours, when you would take damage from failing a survival or crafting check, you can choose to transfer any amount of that damage to the toolbox. This cannot reduce damage taken from creatures (such as bites, kicks, scratches, and the like). The toolbox is found with 10d8 (45) HP left. When the toolbox runs out of HP, any leftover damage from the transfer that caused it to break is directed back to you.

Magnetic Gloves.description:
These leather gloves are interlaced with thin metal plates across the fingers
 and palms. You cannot be unwillingly disarmed of any metal object that you are
 holding and do not need to make STR checks when climbing a metal surface (you
 automatically succeed).
Magnetic Gloves.content:
Gloves, Uncommon, Essence 15


These leather gloves are interlaced with thin metal plates across the fingers and palms. You cannot be unwillingly disarmed of any metal object that you are holding and do not need to make STR checks when climbing a metal surface (you automatically succeed).

Masquerade Mirror.description:
This silver framed hand-mirror is wrapped in delicate engravings of leering
 masks. It has 2 charges and regains its charges at dusk each day. When you
 stare into the mirror for 30 minutes, you can expend the mirror's charge to
 magically change your facial features, clothing, and physical appearance (but
 not your size) for 4 hours. This appearance can withstand casual scrutiny but
 is revealed to any spell or effect that sees through illusion magic.
Masquerade Mirror.content:
Supernatural Item, Uncommon, Essence 15


This silver framed hand-mirror is wrapped in delicate engravings of leering masks. It has 2 charges and regains its charges at dusk each day. When you stare into the mirror for 30 minutes, you can expend the mirror's charge to magically change your facial features, clothing, and physical appearance (but not your size) for 4 hours. This appearance can withstand casual scrutiny but is revealed to any spell or effect that sees through illusion magic.

Messenger Bracelet.description:
This thin silver bracelet is inlaid with a clear oval stone. When two or more
 Messenger Bracelets are placed within 3 inches of one another for one hour the
 stones of all Messenger Bracelets shift to the same color. Until they are
 realigned with new bracelets, anyone wearing one of those Messenger Bracelets
 may whisper up to 25 words into their bracelet and have the message spoken
 directly into the minds of all others wearing those bracelets. The message is
 transferred in the language in which it was spoken. Each bracelet may use this
 feature once per hour.
Messenger Bracelet.content:
Worn Item, Uncommon, Essence 15


This thin silver bracelet is inlaid with a clear oval stone. When two or more Messenger Bracelets are placed within 3 inches of one another for one hour the stones of all Messenger Bracelets shift to the same color. Until they are realigned with new bracelets, anyone wearing one of those Messenger Bracelets may whisper up to 25 words into their bracelet and have the message spoken directly into the minds of all others wearing those bracelets. The message is transferred in the language in which it was spoken. Each bracelet may use this feature once per hour.

Ring Of Protection.description:
This golden ring is affixed with a single blue gemstone. You gain DR 2 against
 all damage.
Ring Of Protection.content:
Ring, Rare, Essence 20


This golden ring is affixed with a single blue gemstone. You gain DR 2 against all damage.

Sea Legs.description:
These knee-high leather boots have a small buckle on each foot shaped like an
 anchor. You have Immune Shaken and Immune Sickened if you would suffer either
 condition as a result of physical disorientation. The boots have 1 charge,
 which it regains at dawn each day. You may utter a command word and expend 1
 charge to become rooted to the spot where you are standing for 1 minute. While
 rooted, you cannot be moved willingly or unwillingly and are considered
 Grounded.
Sea Legs.content:
Boots, Uncommon, Essence 15


These knee-high leather boots have a small buckle on each foot shaped like an anchor. You have Immune Shaken and Immune Sickened if you would suffer either condition as a result of physical disorientation. The boots have 1 charge, which it regains at dawn each day. You may utter a command word and expend 1 charge to become rooted to the spot where you are standing for 1 minute. While rooted, you cannot be moved willingly or unwillingly and are considered Grounded.

Spell Thief's Scroll.description:
This scroll is made from very fine parchment and bears a large circle of
 arcane sigils. While equipped, and if the Spell Thief's Scroll is empty, you
 may spend 2 Reactive AP when you are hit by a spell that has no other targets.
 You cancel that spell's effect and store the spell. You may cast that spell
 one time without spending SP; you cannot upcharge it. The spell is then
 removed from the scroll. Only one spell may be stored in the Spell Thief's
 Scroll at a time.
Spell Thief's Scroll.content:
Scroll, Rare, Essence 20


This scroll is made from very fine parchment and bears a large circle of arcane sigils. While equipped, and if the Spell Thief's Scroll is empty, you may spend 2 Reactive AP when you are hit by a spell that has no other targets. You cancel that spell's effect and store the spell. You may cast that spell one time without spending SP; you cannot upcharge it. The spell is then removed from the scroll. Only one spell may be stored in the Spell Thief's Scroll at a time.

Viperstrike Bracers.description:
These iron bracers are decorated in carvings of striking vipers. You gain +2
 AP per round. This additional AP may only be used for weapon attacks.
Viperstrike Bracers.content:
Bracers, Epic, Essence 35


These iron bracers are decorated in carvings of striking vipers. You gain +2 AP per round. This additional AP may only be used for weapon attacks.

Visage Of Fear.description:
This dark steel helmet includes a faceplate shaped like a snarling fiend. The
 item has 1 charge, which it regains at dusk each evening. While wearing this
 helmet, you suffer -1 CHA, but gain +6 to the Intimidating skill.

 You may spend the item's charge and 2 AP to make a CHA/Intimidating check vs a
 living target's WILL. On a hit, the target gains the Phobic condition for 24
 hours. You choose the phobia. It can be a specific creature, a type of animal
 or plant, a color, or a concept, such as the number seven. It cannot be
 something fundamental to the creature's existence, such as breathing, eating,
 or their own face.
Visage Of Fear.content:
Helmet, Rare, Essence 20


This dark steel helmet includes a faceplate shaped like a snarling fiend. The item has 1 charge, which it regains at dusk each evening. While wearing this helmet, you suffer -1 CHA, but gain +6 to the Intimidating skill.


You may spend the item's charge and 2 AP to make a CHA/Intimidating check vs a living target's WILL. On a hit, the target gains the Phobic condition for 24 hours. You choose the phobia. It can be a specific creature, a type of animal or plant, a color, or a concept, such as the number seven. It cannot be something fundamental to the creature's existence, such as breathing, eating, or their own face.

Wanderer's Doorknocker.description:
This brass door knocker is shaped like a small angel clutching a large ring.
 You may spend 4 AP to attach the Wanderer's Doorknocker to any door. By
 whispering a location that is familiar to you and on the same plane of
 existence, you may activate the Wanderer's Doorknocker and cause the door to
 which it is attached to connect to a random door within 500 ft of the
 whispered location, determined by the MC. If no door is present, the
 Wanderer's Doorknocker does not activate. This effect lasts for one minute,
 after which the Doorknocker falls to the ground at the whispered location's
 doorstep, or until the Doorknocker is removed from the door by spending 1 AP.
 Once activated, the Wanderer's Doorknocker cannot be used again for 24 hours.
Wanderer's Doorknocker.content:
Supernatural Item, Epic, Essence 40


This brass door knocker is shaped like a small angel clutching a large ring. You may spend 4 AP to attach the Wanderer's Doorknocker to any door. By whispering a location that is familiar to you and on the same plane of existence, you may activate the Wanderer's Doorknocker and cause the door to which it is attached to connect to a random door within 500 ft of the whispered location, determined by the MC. If no door is present, the Wanderer's Doorknocker does not activate. This effect lasts for one minute, after which the Doorknocker falls to the ground at the whispered location's doorstep, or until the Doorknocker is removed from the door by spending 1 AP. Once activated, the Wanderer's Doorknocker cannot be used again for 24 hours.

Clearblood Elixir.description:
This milky white potion has an acrid, burnt taste. After drinking this potion,
 you are immediately cured of all diseases and poisons.
Clearblood Elixir.content:
Potion, Legendary


This milky white potion has an acrid, burnt taste. After drinking this potion, you are immediately cured of all diseases and poisons.

Drake's Breath Elixir.description:
This orange potion swirls with trails of gold and white. After drinking this
 potion you may immediately make a special attack. Make an END attack against
 the REF of all creatures within a 30 ft cone. On a hit, deal 2d12+END fire
 damage. On a miss, ½ damage.
Drake's Breath Elixir.content:
Potion, Uncommon


This orange potion swirls with trails of gold and white. After drinking this potion you may immediately make a special attack. Make an END attack against the REF of all creatures within a 30 ft cone. On a hit, deal 2d12+END fire damage. On a miss, ½ damage.

Draught Of Fortitude.description:
This dark green potion smells faintly of fresh earth. After drinking this
 potion, gain +4 to END skill checks and +4 FORT for 1 hour.
Draught Of Fortitude.content:
Potion, Common


This dark green potion smells faintly of fresh earth. After drinking this potion, gain +4 to END skill checks and +4 FORT for 1 hour.

Elixir Of Life.description:
This potion appears to be liquid silver. If administered to a creature that
 has died within the past 24 hours, that creature returns to life with 1 HP, 7
 Death Points, and Fatigued.
Elixir Of Life.content:
Potion, Epic


This potion appears to be liquid silver. If administered to a creature that has died within the past 24 hours, that creature returns to life with 1 HP, 7 Death Points, and Fatigued.

Hunter's Draught.description:
This thin black liquid smells of blood. After drinking this potion you
 immediately take 1d6 corrosive damage. You gain +1 STR, +1 DEX, and Darkvision
 60 ft for one hour.
Hunter's Draught.content:
Potion, Rare


This thin black liquid smells of blood. After drinking this potion you immediately take 1d6 corrosive damage. You gain +1 STR, +1 DEX, and Darkvision 60 ft for one hour.

Mimic Mix.description:
This thick golden paste can be applied to any medium or smaller nonmagical
 inanimate object by spending 2 AP. Five minutes after application, the target
 object becomes a mimic using a Mimic stat block of the appropriate
 size. It follows the simple mental commands of whomever applied the Mimic Mix.
 After 24 hours or after being reduced to 0 HP the object reverts to its
 mundane state.
Mimic Mix.content:
Potion, Rare


This thick golden paste can be applied to any medium or smaller nonmagical inanimate object by spending 2 AP. Five minutes after application, the target object becomes a mimic using a Mimic stat block of the appropriate size. It follows the simple mental commands of whomever applied the Mimic Mix. After 24 hours or after being reduced to 0 HP the object reverts to its mundane state.

Potion Of Haste.description:
This potion is a shimmering yellow and smells like honey and lilacs. After
 drinking this potion you gain +2 AP at the start of each of your turns and +4
 REF for 10 minutes.
Potion Of Haste.content:
Potion, Rare


This potion is a shimmering yellow and smells like honey and lilacs. After drinking this potion you gain +2 AP at the start of each of your turns and +4 REF for 10 minutes.

Potion Of The Fundamental.description:
This dark blue potion swirls with black smoke. After drinking this potion,
 regain 1d8+4 Spell Points.
Potion Of The Fundamental.content:
Potion, Rare


This dark blue potion swirls with black smoke. After drinking this potion, regain 1d8+4 Spell Points.
